name: dimpled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having one or more small hollow areas in the surface, for example of a person's face when they smile: dimpled cheeks His skin was thick and dimpled, like an orange peel. See
dimple
More examplesFewer examplesa dimpled 3-month old babyHe had a quick, dimpled smile and messy brown hair.Early snapshots of Titan, the moon of Saturn, show it may be dimpled with huge lakes.
